alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 9:30AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Alameda, east central San Mateo and south central Contra Costa Counties through 945 AM PST... At 929 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Oakland to near San Lorenzo to Belmont. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakland, Fremont, Hayward, San Mateo, San Leandro, Redwood City, Alameda, San Ramon, Pleasanton, Union City, Dublin, Newark, Danville, Menlo Park, Foster City, East Palo Alto, Castro Valley, San Lorenzo, Blackhawk-Camino Tassajara and Blackhawk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
